questions.question: Q1. Which of the following methods is useful for achieving a deadbeat response using state feedback?
Q2. What is the relationship between state feedback and system controllability?

answers.a: The system must be controllable to achieve a deadbeat response
answers.b: The system does not need to be controllable for deadbeat response
answers.c: Controllability is only required for steady-state performance
answers.d: Controllability is unrelated to state feedback control
